recipesJson.name: An Xxxellent Creampie
recipesJson.author: Ledpedal
recipesJson.description:
A very simple and creamy Coconut Pistachio Cream Pie...

Although WF Pistachio Cream is not 100% a Pistachio, it is a wonderful almond/pistachio flavor. The creaminess of this flavors blends perfectly with WF Coconut Cream Pie. WF Coconut Cream Pie is a wonderfully thick coconut cream that has all the feel and characteristics of a well-balanced pie. The crust part was lacking a bit so I added OOO Pie Crust and JF Biscuit. It definitely has that crust with burnt edge taste to it. 

That's all I needed for this recipe. Simple yet perfectly balanced and delicious. It's all there.

Please try and share your feedback!
